item.description: The King to our Frisbee Kingdom is stepping down and we feel you all need to come to show your respects.  Joe Baz, the main organizer at Boston Frisbee and Cara are both stepping down from organizing BF.  Let's all come to Karla's house and celebrate all the memorable times with these best of the best!
item.how_to_find_us: ATTENTION: CHANGE OF VENUE! Off the Blue Line - Maverick stop. Street parking is available.
item.name: Goodbye Party for Joe and Cara
